item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ggtree and your publication will be featured here. 2018 Amphibian chytridiomycosis outbreak dynamics are linked with host skin bacterial community structure. Nature Communications, 2018, 9:693. Molecular epidemiology reveals the role of war in the spread of HIV in Ukraine. PNAS, 2018, 115(5):1051-1056. 2017 Integrated view of Vibrio cholerae in the Americas. Science, 2017, 358(6364):789-793. Phylogenetic analysis of the human antibody repertoire reveals quantitative signatures of immune senescence and aging.
